intro_text: The cats head out into the forested slopes, hiding from the heat of greenleaf. p_l leads them towards a massive messy eagle nest.
decline_text: When they get there, p_l can't find the hummingbird {PRONOUN/p_l/subject} {VERB/p_l/were/was} expecting. Disappointing.

success_outcomes.text: app1 screws up {PRONOUN/app1/poss} face in confusion - weren't they here to learn about hummingbirds, not eagles? p_l, in a low whisper, carefully points out the tiny nest sitting in the shadow of the big one. Hummingbirds use the big predator's nest to conceal and protect their own tiny ones, {PRONOUN/p_l/subject} {VERB/p_l/explain/explains}.

log.cats_from: to_cat taught from_cat about how hummingbirds nest in the shadows of eagles' nests.
from_cat taught to_cat about how hummingbirds nest in the shadows of eagles' nests.

success_outcomes.text: p_l tells app1 to watch carefully - not the rowdy eagle nest, but the tiny home in its shadow. A female hummingbird climbs out and takes to the wing, headed for the mountain meadows. app1's jaw drops as she whizzes past, nearly soundless, blindingly fast, and zigzagging through the trees in a way app1 swore was impossible for birds.

log.cats_from: to_cat taught from_cat about how hummingbirds nest in the shadows of eagles' nests.
from_cat taught to_cat about how hummingbirds nest in the shadows of eagles' nests.

success_outcomes.text: As they watch the hummingbird nest in the shadow of the eagle nest, s_c tells app1 how the hummingbird arrival signals the start of greenleaf and how the Clan will know it's leaf-fall when the birds leave their territory. The more hummingbirds there are that year, the better a greenleaf it'll be.

log.cats_from: to_cat taught from_cat how to tell seasons by the hummingbirds' arrival.
from_cat taught to_cat how to tell seasons by the hummingbirds' arrival.

success_outcomes.text: As they watch the hummingbird nest in the shadow of the eagle nest, s_c tells app1 how c_n's founders followed the hummingbird's wisdom, setting up the Clan in the shadow of the dangers of the mountain to protect c_n cats from the attention of Twolegs and endless wars with other cat Clans.

log.cats_from: to_cat taught from_cat how c_n's founders followed the wisdom of the hummingbirds when choosing a home.
from_cat taught to_cat how c_n's founders followed the wisdom of the hummingbirds when choosing a home.

fail_outcomes.text: app1 cannot believe that going near an eagle nest could ever possibly be safe and flatly refuses to go.

log.cats_from: from_cat lost respect for to_cat when {PRONOUN/to_cat/subject} refused to go near an eagle nest.

fail_outcomes.text: p_l can't get app1 to take the training session seriously and gives up before the apprentice can attract the eagles' attention.

intro_text: With p_l in the lead, the cats round a corner in the mountain path and come across a flat mountain meadow, transformed by greenleaf into a carpet of sunny bright flowers.
decline_text: When they get there, p_l can't find the hummingbirds {PRONOUN/p_l/subject} {VERB/p_l/were/was} expecting. Disappointing.

success_outcomes.text: app1 sticks {PRONOUN/app1/poss} nose down into the soft dew-covered meadowgrass, searching for prey scent, but p_l's tail flicks under {PRONOUN/app1/poss} chin, prompting {PRONOUN/app1/poss} head up. {PRONOUN/app1/subject/CAP} {VERB/app1/gasp/gasps}. Above {PRONOUN/app1/object}, a male hummingbird hovers, his full breeding plumage flashing brilliantly in the sun.

log.cats_from: to_cat showed from_cat the greenleaf hummingbirds.
from_cat showed to_cat the greenleaf hummingbirds.

success_outcomes.text: They're here to follow the hummingbirds, p_l explains with a laugh and dives into the thick meadowgrass sea. app1 spends the afternoon bounding through the flowers, following the birds as the males fight, learning about how hummingbirds signal good hunting areas.

log.cats_from: to_cat taught from_cat how hummingbirds can lead cats to good hunting grounds.
from_cat taught to_cat how hummingbirds can lead cats to good hunting grounds.

success_outcomes.text: app1 leaps into the meadows, bouncing around as hummingbirds flit away before {PRONOUN/app1/object}. s_c watches {PRONOUN/app1/object} indulgently, and when {PRONOUN/app1/subject} {VERB/app1/slow/slows} down s_c explains about how c_n uses hunting the agile birds as the ultimate test - it's considered the mark of a truly fantastic hunter to catch one without using claws and pluck a single shining feather.

log.cats_from: to_cat told from_cat about how the mark of a great c_n hunter is to catch a hummingbird without unsheathed claws.
from_cat told to_cat about how the mark of a great c_n hunter is to catch a hummingbird without unsheathed claws.

success_outcomes.text: s_c pulls app1's attention towards the flashing hummingbirds darting about. Once upon a time, a fire threatened to consume everything but the bare rock of the mountains, but StarClan caught its embers, stopping it from spreading. They released those embers in greenleaf, to fly above the flowering meadows they'd saved from destruction.

log.cats_from: to_cat told from_cat the story of how StarClan preserved the embers of an all-consuming fire and allowed them to fly above the greenleaf meadows as hummingbirds.
to_cat told from_cat the story of how StarClan preserved the embers of an all-consuming fire and allowed them to fly above the greenleaf meadows as hummingbirds.

fail_outcomes.text: app1 won't stop {PRONOUN/app1/poss} hunting attempts for long enough for p_l to teach, and eventually everyone goes home frustrated.

log.cats_from: to_cat was too busy chasing after hummingbirds to listen to from_cat's lesson.

intro_text: app1 crouches low behind some grass, searching for the ideal prey to fall to {PRONOUN/app1/poss} deadly claws. In front of the mighty hunter, a brightly colored beetle alights on a rock.

success_outcomes.text: Ha! app1 pounces, the pathetic bug crunching underneath {PRONOUN/app1/poss} mighty blow, splattering and - ewwwww. Ew, ew ew ew, there's bug juice all over {PRONOUN/app1/poss} paws, between {PRONOUN/app1/poss} toes, EWWWWW!

Ha! app1 leaps, tail lashing furiously as the beetle buzzes under {PRONOUN/app1/poss} forepaws, claws sheathed. {PRONOUN/app1/subject/CAP} {VERB/app1/bat/bats} the bug off the rock and onto the ground, pouncing after it, jumping and twisting as {PRONOUN/app1/poss} colorful prey flits around {PRONOUN/app1/poss} head in confused, concussed beetle-behavior, unused to being an apprentice's new favorite toy.

s_c pounces, flipping the beetle with soft paws and flopping over onto {PRONOUN/app1/poss} back, watching the insect scurry from one paw to the other, so completely entranced by its color and tiny, perfect legs that {PRONOUN/app1/subject} {VERB/app1/don't/doesn't} notice {PRONOUN/app1/poss} own skill catching and keeping the bug.

fail_outcomes.text: While app1 is wiggling {PRONOUN/app1/poss} butt into the perfect pouncing position, the beetle flies off. Awwwww.

Slimy, yet satisfying! Curiosity completed, app1 wanders off - but has to report to the medicine cat den later, when {PRONOUN/app1/poss} stomach reminds {PRONOUN/app1/object} why cats don't eat random bugs.

log.cats_from: from_cat was amused to hear that to_cat hunted and ate a beetle, then got a stomachache from it.

intro_text: As the cats practice hunting in the dim light of the golden setting sun, p_l is reminded of the tale of How The Sunset Came To Be.
decline_text: The light is too weird to focus on both training and a story. It'll have to wait for another day.

success_outcomes.text: Long ago, the prettiest queen of the mountains ruled a harsh Clan, attacking those deemed unworthy and ugly. Her granddaughter was beautiful not just in pelt but in heart and was killed by her treacherous kin for her kindness. She could not stop her grandmother in life, but in death she marked the skies with her pelt, bringing forth the first sunset.

log.cats_from: from_cat enjoyed to_cat's story about the origin of the sunset.

success_outcomes.text: s_c listens attentively as p_l tells the patrol about the pretty queen who gave them sunset. s_c can't help but send a silent thanks up to StarClan, since the evening grants c_n some of the best conditions to gather prey in the mountains.

log.cats_from: from_cat enjoyed to_cat's story about the origin of the sunset.

success_outcomes.text: s_c is sympathetic to the poor she-cat in the story. To have been killed by an evil leader, her last act was the gift of the sunset... s_c doesn't know what {PRONOUN/s_c/subject} would do if {PRONOUN/s_c/subject} {VERB/s_c/were/was} in the same situation.
